message.body: Hey Atlanta
Hi there! How is your weekend going?
It's going good.... I went to my sons football warmup/practice today... He's ten and its his first time playing... How bout u?
Awwww that's so cute! I bet he is excited! I went to brunch and went with a friend to try on her wedding dress. It's been a lovely day. Sad to have to goback to work tomorrow. Weekends are too fast
Awww weddings!!!! I love weddings... A friend whose wedding was on June 16th in Carlisle Pa. It was beautiful! I can't wait til it's my turn. By then it should
be perfect. Lol had a long time to think about how I want things
I'm not married either, but my sister is getting married in January. It's so stressful!!
I believe it's stessful bcuz u want everything to be perfect! Is ur sister younger or older
She is 5 years younger. She is getting married near Hilton head, SC but she lives in Chicago
Wow I'm so into love stories and marriages... Lol I don't know, guess I really want that perfect love story for my self
Me too! We deserve it :)
Yes I've been with my kids father off and on for 11 yrs. we had 4 kids, one lived for 4 hrs and passed away.. I feel like what in the world is he waiting for?
Come on and ask already!!! Lol
Wow, y'all have been through a lot! He needs to lock you down!! :)
Right but he's taking his Mary little time lol... Are u from Chicago too?
No, I live in Atlanta. My sisters and I grew up in NC. Where are you from?
I'm from Philly! I have family in Atlanta...
Good morning Atlanta!!!! How was ur night?
Hi there! It was nice a low key. Watched some tv, went to the grocery store. How about you?
It was cool... Ordered out, watched The Purge and just relaxed... It's hot out today think I might pick up a 5 gallon water ice for the kids... Are u at work?
It's really really hot today! Yeah I'm at work. Boo for Mondays!
Lol awe man!!!
I need a vacation so badly! I work in a storage closet that I share with two other people with no windows. It's kinda depressing!
Wow yea that sounds depressing!!!
How long have u worked there?
Id do much better at the pool all day! :) I've been at this position for 3.5 years
Oh yea it's time to move up... Yes I could do a pool too. Maybe a private pool with just me. Sometimes I feel like I need to get away for an hour
Yes!!! Just a bit of alone time
Yes to regroup and feel like myself again
I love to travel alone for the same reason.
